thread.title: Scientists pioneer 3-D-printed drug delivering micro-needles

title: Scientists pioneer 3-D-printed drug delivering micro-needles
text:
Microneedles Could Replace Syringe March 10, 2008 
The common needle phobia and painful injections could soon be a thing of the past, thanks to a revolutionary new drug-delivery technique developed by a team at the Georgia Institute of Technology, US.
